document_data.name: I Harp as I See It
document_data.author: [[Abranthar Foraeren]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''''I Harp As I See It''''' was a [[book]] written by the [[Harper]] [[Abranthar Foraeren|Abranthar "Twoquills" Foraeren]]. It was published in [[1365 DR]].{{Cite web/The Candlekeep Collection}}

{{quote|''It was in the years after the Time of Troubles when Those Who Harp first truly became aware that one of the dark elf ladies who danced betimes under the moon perilously close to fair Waterdeep was the long-hidden Seventh Sister. Certain individuals given to embracing less noble purposes learned this too; some of them haven't recovered even yet.''}}
document_data.History:
As of [[1372 DR]], a copy could be found in the [[Leaves of Learning]] in [[Highmoon]] and the original rested in the shelves of [[Candlekeep]].{{Cite web enhancement/The Leaves of Learning|5}}

''I Harp As I See It'' referred to one of the [[Seven Sisters]], [[Qilu√© Veladorn]].
